scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: In the mid 1950s, Arnow received correspondence from Mrs. A. S. Frye regarding research for the Cumberland books. Letters from Mrs. A. S. Frye have been placed in the General Correspondence (Box 34, Folders 15-16) in 1954 with the dates of May 2, August 5, August 6, August 23, August 26, September 12, October 3, October 27, November 28, and November 30 and in General Correspondence (Box 35, Folder 1) in 1955 with the dates of February 24 and March 16. It is interesting to note that this research was completed six years before publication of Seedtime and nine before publication of Flowering.
